title: The Dean Has Arrived - Novel Updates
tags: Determined Protagonist   Elemental Magic   Game Elements   Loli   Male Protagonist   System Administrator   Teachers   Transmigration   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong
author: Bat Onigiri   蝙蝠饭团
description:
I see that you have amazing bones, little girl! You have a talent for magic like no other! The task of maintaining world peace will fall on you in the future. I am Zwei, the Dean of the Magic Academy. I have an admission notice here. I can see that you are fated with magic, so I'll accept you as a student! 

--- 

This is the story of a hard-working transmigrator that has transmigrated to a foreign world with a fraudulent academic system and has no choice but to strive toward the goal of establishing the world's best magic academy.>
